member.name: T:Telerik.Reporting.AI.RAG.AITableProcessor
member.summary: Processes AI table data by filtering and reducing tables to only relevant cells based on query similarity.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.AI.RAG.AITableProcessor.ReduceTablesToRelevantCellsOnlyAsync(System.String[],System.String,Telerik.Documents.AI.Core.IContextFragmentsManager,Telerik.Documents.AI.Core.EmbeddingSettings)
member.summary: Reduces tables to contain only cells that are relevant to the given query.
member.param: The JSON fragments containing table data.
The query to analyze for relevance.
The context fragments manager for AI operations.
The embedding settings to use for analysis.
member.returns: An array of filtered fragments containing only relevant table cells.
member.exception: Thrown when any required parameter is null.
Thrown when the query is null or empty.

member.name: T:Telerik.Reporting.AI.RAG.JsonTableFilter

member.returns: An array of filtered fragments.

member.name: T:Telerik.Reporting.AI.RAG.JsonTableHelper
member.summary: Provides helper methods for working with JSON table structures.
